title: Wildlife in the dry
creator_credit: Ronald Turner and Motif Film Productions
brief_description: A study of the principal birds of the Northern Territory during the dry season: brolgas, ibis, ducks, finches, parrots, egrets, geese and cormorants. Other wildlife of the region - crocodiles and buffaloes are also shown.
